course.title: ADM 2304 Applications of Statistical Methods in Business (3 units)
course.desc: Topics include the estimation (using confidence intervals) and hypothesis testing (including non-parametric methods); correlation and the simple linear regression model (with extensions to multiple regression); and chi-square tests on qualitative data. Emphasis on understanding when and how to use (and not misuse) various methods. Hands-on experience with statistical software tools. (The lab is optional.)Course Component: Discussion Group, LecturePrerequisite: ADM 2303.
